title: 25 Winter Wedding Guest Outfits (Jumpsuits & Pants Included) To Be Best Dressed
description: If you haven’t already, it’s time to start planning your winter wedding guest outfits. Whether you’re looking for a new party dress or are partial to formal pants, we’re here to help you get the ball rolling on your search for what to wear to this season's nuptials. These festivities are a chance to play around with seasonal colors and dazzling fabrics — think velvet dresses and special-occasion jumpsuits for more formal affairs, or sequin numbers that embody that New Year vibe.We’ve rounded up 25 winter wedding guest outfit ideas for every dress code, budget, and personal style. Ahead, find the best winter dresses, jumpsuits, and pantsuits from reader-favorite retailers like Free People, Reformation, Zara, and more that’ll get you on the best-dressed list for every party.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Black-tie Wedding Guest DressesFormal winter weddings likely require black-tie dresses, which should probably be floor-length but certainly don’t have to be black. Look out for rich jewel tones in satin or iridescent fabrics. We’re eyeing holiday-appropriate ruffles for extra dimension and drama. Then, throw on a faux-fur shawl, slip into comfortable heels, and swipe on burgundy lipstick to complete your ensemble.Shop EloquiiEloquii Dramatic Ruffle Gown, $, available at EloquiiMichael Costello x Revolve Loren GownShop RevolveMichael Costello x revolve Loren Gown, $, available at RevolveStaud Calluna Iridescent DressShop StaudStaud Calluna Iridescent Dress, $, available at StaudShow Me Your Mumu Greta DressShop Show Me Your MumuShow Me Your Mumu Greta Dress, $, available at Show Me Your MumuHouse of Harlow 1960 x Revolve Astra GownShop RevolveHouse of Harlow 1960 x Revolve Astra Gown, $, available at RevolveCocktail Wedding Guest DressesCocktail attire is one of the most popular special-occasion dress codes. Somewhere in between formal and casual, it allows you (and the party) to move from day to night, and it opens you up to more silhouettes, hemline lengths, and fabrics.
